mapper.select: select PRO_NO , PRO_TITLE , PRO_GRANT_WHETHER , PRO_CREATE_DATE , PRO_MANAGER , PRO_NUMBERPEOPLE , ( select listagg(d.dept_name, ', ') within group(order by d.dept_name) from dept d, project_dept pd where d.dept_no = pd.dept_no and p.pro_no = pd.pro_no ) PRODEPT from project p where PRO_STATUS = 'Y' order by PRO_NO desc
select USER_NAME , USER_NO from USERS where DEPT_NO = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into PROJECT_MEMBER ( PRO_NO , USER_NO ) values ( seq_project.currval , #{userNo} )
insert into PROJECT_DEPT ( PRO_NO , DEPT_NO ) values ( seq_project.currval , #{deptNo} )
mapper.update: update PROJECT set PRO_STATUS='N' where PRO_NO = #{proNo}
mapper.select: select WORKBOARD_NO , USER_NO , PRO_NO , WORK_MANAGER , WORK_STARTDATE , WORK_ENDDATE , WORK_STATUS , WORK_PRIORITY , WORK_PROGRESS , WORK_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(WORK_CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "WORK_CREATE_DATE" , WORKBOARD_WRITER , WORK_TITLE , ATTACH_ORIGIN_NAME , ATTACH_CHANGE_NAME from WORKBOARD JOIN ATTACHMENT USING (WORKBOARD_NO) where PRO_NO = #{proNo} AND BOARD_STATUS='Y' order by WORKBOARD_NO desc

select PRO_NO , PRO_MANAGER , PRO_NUMBERPEOPLE , ( select listagg(u.user_name, ',') within group(order by u.user_name) from users u, project_member pm where u.user_no = pm.user_no and p.pro_no = pm.pro_no ) PRO_USERNAME from project p where PRO_STATUS = 'Y' and pro_no = #{proNo} order by PRO_NO desc

select WORKBOARD_NO , USER_NO , PRO_NO , WORK_MANAGER , WORK_STARTDATE , WORK_ENDDATE , WORK_STATUS , WORK_PRIORITY , WORK_TITLE from WORKBOARD JOIN ATTACHMENT USING (WORKBOARD_NO) where PRO_NO = #{proNo} AND BOARD_STATUS='Y' AND WORK_MANAGER= #{workManager} order by WORKBOARD_NO desc
